title: Ancient city of Pisidia Antiokheia holds unanswered secrets
description: Archaeological excavations continue at the ancient city of Pisidia Antiokheia in the western province of Isparta, the site visited by St. Paul and Barnabas in 46 A.D., where one of history’s first Christian sermons was preached.

title: Discover the Rich History and Stunning Landscapes of Mongolia’s Shar-Tsav in the Gobi Desert: A New UNESCO Global Geopark Featuring Ancient Dinosaur Fossils, Here’s What You Need to Know Before You Go
description: Discover the Rich History and Stunning Landscapes of Mongolia’s Shar-Tsav in the Gobi Desert: A New UNESCO Global Geopark Featuring Ancient Dinosaur Fossils, Here’s What You Need to Know Before You GoMongolia's Shar-Tsav region is set to be a UNESCO Global Geopark, renowned for its dinosaur fossils, offering a unique destination for history and nature enthusiasts.The post Discover the Rich History and Stunning Landscapes of Mongolia’s Shar-Tsav in the Gobi Desert: A New UNESCO Global Geopark Featuring Ancient Dinosaur Fossils, Here’s What You Need to Know Before You Go appeared first on Travel And Tour World.

title: Ethiopia: Renowned Astronomer Praises Ethiopia's Living Sanctuary of Ancient Astronomy
description: [ENA] Addis Ababa -- Ethiopia continues to serve as a living sanctuary for humanity's oldest intellectual pursuit, astronomy, preserving a deep and diverse celestial heritage that remains relevant in the modern scientific world, according to astronomer Mirjana Pović.
